tts_best_practices.name: Text-to-Speech Best Practices
tts_best_practices.description: Guidelines for achieving optimal TTS results and audio quality

principles: Use proper punctuation for natural pauses
Remove special characters that don't contribute to speech

ssml_markup.description: Speech Synthesis Markup Language for advanced control

context_dependent: US → U.S. or United States (depending on context)
CEO → C.E.O. or chief executive officer

sentence_length.ideal: 15-20 words per sentence for natural flow
sentence_length.considerations: Longer sentences may sound rushed or unclear

paragraph_structure.transitions: Use connecting words for smooth flow

vocabulary.pronunciation: Consider phonetic spelling for difficult words
vocabulary.jargon: Define or replace technical terms for general audience
vocabulary.numbers: Write out numbers under 10, use digits for larger numbers

considerations: Lower values = more creative but potentially inconsistent
Start with 0.75 and adjust based on results

style.impact: Amplifies the original speaker's style and emotion
warnings: High values can create unnatural results
Test thoroughly before using in production

considerations: Higher quality models = longer processing time
Multilingual models work better for non-English content
Test different models for your specific use case

stt_best_practices.name: Speech-to-Text Best Practices
stt_best_practices.description: Guidelines for optimal speech transcription accuracy and results

speaker_guidelines: Speak clearly and at moderate pace

pre_processing.noise_reduction: Apply gentle noise reduction if needed
pre_processing.editing: Remove long silences and non-speech sections
pre_processing.format_conversion: Convert to supported format if necessary

language_settings.specification: Always specify language code when known
language_settings.auto_detection: Use only when language is unknown
language_settings.multi_language: Process separately if multiple languages present

optimization: Ensure speakers have different vocal characteristics
Good microphone placement for all speakers

file_organization.grouping: Group files by language or speaker if possible
file_organization.metadata: Keep track of recording context and settings

processing_strategy.batch_size: Process 10-20 files at a time for manageable results
processing_strategy.error_handling: Check for failed transcriptions and retry
processing_strategy.quality_check: Review sample outputs before processing large batches

sound_effects_best_practices.name: Sound Effects Generation Best Practices
sound_effects_best_practices.description: Guidelines for creating high-quality sound effects from text descriptions

be_descriptive: Specify size and scale (large, small, distant)
Add context (busy street, quiet forest, empty room)

examples.good: Heavy rain drops hitting a tin roof with occasional thunder
examples.better: Gentle ocean waves lapping against sandy shore on calm evening

duration_planning.looping: Consider if effect will be looped - avoid abrupt starts/endings

context_inclusion.temporal_context: Dawn, night, rush hour, quiet morning

organization.categorization: Group by type (ambient, impact, musical, etc.)

quality_control.preview_generation: Generate single effects before batch processing
quality_control.parameter_testing: Test different durations for same description
quality_control.consistency_check: Ensure effects work well together if part of collection

voice_transformation_best_practices.name: Voice Transformation Best Practices
voice_transformation_best_practices.description: Guidelines for effective speech-to-speech voice conversion and audio enhancement

audio_quality.clarity: Clear speech with minimal background noise
audio_quality.consistency: Consistent volume and distance from microphone
audio_quality.format: High-quality audio format (WAV preferred, high-bitrate MP3 acceptable)
audio_quality.duration: Works best with segments under 5 minutes

speech_characteristics.pace: Natural speaking pace (not too fast or slow)

model_selection.alternatives: Other models may work but not optimized for this task

voice_parameters.similarity_boost: 0.7-0.9 for close match to target voice
voice_parameters.considerations: Higher similarity_boost = closer match but may reduce naturalness

use_cases: Isolating speech from mixed audio content
Cleaning up interview or podcast recordings

expectations.noise_reduction: Significant reduction in consistent background noise
expectations.limitations: Works best with consistent background noise patterns

post_processing.quality_check: Review isolated audio before further processing
post_processing.normalization: May need volume normalization after isolation
post_processing.editing: Remove any artifacts or distortions if present

production_workflows.name: Production Workflow Best Practices
production_workflows.description: End-to-end workflows for professional audio production
